EmailTemplate.subject: Hey Bay Area! We’re extending this SpringOne Platform discount just for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, As a member of the Bay Area tech community, we'd really like to connect with you at this year's SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]> event. The conference will take place at Moscone West in San Francisco from December 4-7, right across the street from Pivotal’s headquarters.
Although our SpringOne Platform discount codes have expired, we’re extending a special deal for our friends in the Bay.
Register by Friday, December 1 <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]> to receive $400 off your ticket!
With over 2000 attendees, 150+ sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]> on the hottest tech topics, some of the coolest industry speakers, fun parties, networking opportunities, and more, SpringOne <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]> Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]> is the perfect opportunity to hear from hundreds of practitioners about how you can build software people love.
Please use this discount code BAY_AREA_400 for $400 off the price of a standard conference pass.
Don't hesitate. Register Now! <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-bayarea-q417]]>
Follow @s1p <[[https://twitter.com/@s1p]]> for the latest #springone <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]> updates and visit springoneplatform.io <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]> to see new sessions, agenda and main stage speakers.
We hope to see you there! The SpringOne Platform Team
